column1: #ID - identificator column (unecesary if BP and CHR)
#RSID - rs number column (unnecessary but advised - can be generated in next steps)
#BETA - beta value column (can only be skipped if ZSCORE column is present)
#SE - beta standard deviation column (can only be skipped if ZSCORE column is present)
#ZSCORE - z-score value column (can only be skipped if BETA and SE columns are present)
#NCASES - cases sample size (unneccessary if sample size is given in other way
#NCONTROLS - control sample size (unneccessary if sample size is given in other way
#NEFF - efficient sample size (unneccessary if sample size is given in other way)
#N - sample size (unneccessary if sample size is given in other way
